meanings.definition: Pertaining to the Greek poet Anacreon.
meanings.sent1: The students studied the anacreontic poems in their literature class.
meanings.sent2: The anacreontic style of writing is known for its lyrical beauty.
meanings.sent3: The anacreontic decorations in the room added a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent4: Her dress had an anacreontic flair, reminiscent of ancient Greek fashion.
meanings.sent5: The garden was filled with anacreontic flowers, blooming in vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: A poem or song in the style of Anacreon.
meanings.sent1: She wrote an anacreontic poem for her best friend's birthday.
meanings.sent2: The musicians performed an anacreontic song at the festival.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled at the silly anacreontic rhyme.
meanings.sent4: His voice carried the emotions of the anacreontic ballad.
meanings.sent5: The library shelves were filled with anacreontic works, inspiring readers.
